works.description:
The second photograph from the top of the page (http://www.ecurry.com/blog/desserts/kesar-pista-kulfi-with-falooda-saffron-pistachio-ice-cream-served-with-rose-infused-vermicilli/) has  been used without permission. My photograph has the "eCurry" copyright mark on it.

I have left comments on the post to remove, but the photograph still shows.
